summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear implemented: customer share links now include a booking deep-link and the app honors it in customer mode without forcing login; booking submission is enabled for anonymous users and backend createBookingLead no longer enforces authorization, while getBookingLeads remains protected. Diff also includes several unrelated UI/theme and feature additions not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed substantial BISMI CABS branding/theme styling (OKLCH color system, custom fonts) unrelated to share-link/anonymous booking requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for customer deep-link and anonymous booking behavior; no requirement about redesigning global styles or Tailwind theme.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new pricing section/component and expanded Rate Card page to show pricing details beyond the requested share-link/login changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements mention pricing UI or rate card enhancements.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded Leads page functionality (createdBy principal display/copy, polling/notifications, authorization UX changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements only state that viewing leads must remain protected; they do not request new leads management features/UX changes.
Not requested by any REQ; unrelated to deep-linking or anonymous booking.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer-mode navigation changes hiding Profile options in LoginPage/AppShell.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the stated requirements; could be product change but is not requested by REQ-1/2/3.
